definition: abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]

pinyin: Ai1 wen2 he2 pan4 Si1 te4 la1 te4 fu2

definition: Avonmouth in southwest England/same as the Bristol channel 布里斯托爾海峽|布里斯托尔海峡[Bu4 li3 si1 tuo1 er3 hai3 xia2]

sentences.english: Avon Lake, Ohio school Address Telephone Fax arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 埃文湖，俄亥俄學校排名電話傳真網址。

sentences.english: Evans wrote me a short note from shanghai .
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯從上海給我寫了封短簡。
讓我們請教埃文，薛定諤吧。

sentences.english: Evans landed up by becoming Director of Education.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯最後成了教育局長。

sentences.english: Smalling is likely to continue at right-back with Jonny Evans and Phil Jones forming a partnership in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 斯莫林可能得繼續打右後衛，而瓊斯和埃文斯打中衛。

sentences.english: She joined the Evanston, Ill., firm full time last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年她全職加入這家位於伊利諾州埃文斯頓的公司。

sentences.english: Rio Ferdinand and Jonny Evans read everything that came his way before he did.
sentences.chinese: 費迪南德以及埃文斯總能在他之前切斷了他的球路。

sentences.english: Avonlea school was quiet that day.
sentences.chinese: 埃文利學校那天非常平靜。
埃文森的觀點令其他科學家印象深刻。

sentences.english: Young Evanson of Forward Planning caught me a right zinger on the elbow, you know.
sentences.chinese: 前瞻計劃部的小埃文斯給我的胳膊肘來了一槍。

sentences.english: Stamp collecting as well as fishing is Mr. Evan's favorite avocation .
sentences.chinese: 集郵和釣魚都是埃文先生最喜歡的業餘愛好。

sentences.english: View the town's colorful flower gardens and take a boat trip along the River Avon.
sentences.chinese: 觀賞鎮上的絢麗的花園，乘着小舟遊覽埃文河。
埃文，薛定諤也是澳大利亞人。

sentences.english: Sion, the Son of Evan, folk song for voice & piano trio.
sentences.chinese: 埃文的兒子西翁，爲人聲和鋼琴而作的三重唱民歌。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
